enableDeferedReply

public final void enableDeferedReply(boolean b)
Description copied from class: Message
Enable a defered reply. If this feature is enabled, this message is assumed that it will be handled later. Neither a reply nor a exception does not sent to the callee unless you explicitly send a reply regardless of whatever has been returned in handleMessage method.

Overrides:
enableDeferedReply in class Message
Parameters:
b - true if the reply of this message should be defered.

enableDelegation

final void enableDelegation()

getMessageType

public final int getMessageType()
Description copied from class: Message
Returns a type indecating how the message has been sent. This works only for the message passed to the handleMessage method.

Overrides:
getMessageType in class Message
See Also:
Aglet.handleMessage(com.ibm.aglet.message.Message)

normalizePriority

protected int normalizePriority(int priority)
Overrides the method that normalizes the priority. This method simply returns the priority provided as argument, thus you can set a system priority.

Overrides:
normalizePriority in class Message
Parameters:
priority - the priority you want to set for this message
Returns:
the unchanged priority argument
